plugin.label: sc2
plugin.name: SC2
plugin.p: A compressor with sidechain. Based on the code for SC1.

port.label: threshold
port.name: Threshold level (dB)
port.p: The point at which the compressor will start to kick in.

port.label: ratio
port.name: Ratio (1:n)
port.p: The gain reduction ratio used when the signal level exceeds the threshold.

port.label: knee
port.name: Knee radius (dB)
port.p: The distance from the threshold where the knee curve starts.

port.label: makeup_gain
port.name: Makeup gain (dB)
port.p: Controls the gain of the makeup input signal in dB's.
